author: James Martin
method: Heat the olive oil in a medium saucepan. Add the onion and garlic and sauté gently until softened.  Add the remaining ingredients and cook gently for 8 minutes.  Blend with a hand blender until smooth and pour into a bowl to serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  1 clove garlic, chopped,  ½ large potato, peeled and finely chopped ,  150ml/5fl oz chicken stock (vegetarians can substitute vegetable stock),  ½ bunch watercress, chopped,  50ml/2fl oz double cream,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
